description.value:
A Ring locked to require the remains of Jollus Marquette, a -20 Ciphers (Rogue Trader) Test, and 10 minutes. If activated, is so permenantly. Once per Session, wearer may spent a fate point to gain Peer + Good Reputation Talents for any one group until end of encounter. Also gives +10 to Interaction tests on worlds converted by Marquette.

Requirements

An Archeotech Onyx Cogitator Gem inset in a ring, providing innumerable contacts and info. Relics are unique, one of a kind items, they must be earned as opposed to acquired.

Effect: Unique

Notes: -
